messages.content: Hey! I'm Nitya ðŸ‘‹ I'm here to build your website with you. Do you have a site already or are we building from scratch?
build from scratch

Perfect! We're gonna build something great. Let's start with the hero section - the first thing visitors see.

What's your business name?
it is for my musical project LÃ¨s Love I want a I don't know what I want the Hero Section to say it's more of a look so maybe just and image?

Love that! A visual-first hero is super powerful for a music project.

Got an image you want to use for the hero? You can upload it and we'll make it the star of the show!
how do I upload it?

You can drag and drop the image right into this chat, or click the paperclip/attach icon if you see one!

Once it's uploaded, I'll grab it and we'll build your hero section around it.

SYSTEM: Resumed session detected. Please use your MCP tools to read conversation.json, metadata.json, sitemap.json, styles.css, and assets folder to catch yourself up on our progress. Then greet the user naturally and let them know where we left off.

Hey! Welcome back! ðŸ‘‹ 

We were just getting started on your hero section for LÃ¨s Love - you wanted to go image-first which is gonna look amazing for a music project. 

Ready to upload that hero image? Just drag and drop it into the chat!
